website_summaries.verdict: Nasal vents are designed to maximize airflow through the nasal passages comfortably, which can prevent soft palate vibration.
pros: Vents increase airflow through the nostrils, helping to stop rattling in the soft palate and throat
Includes two types of vents in four different sizes
cons: Not recommended for sleep apnea patients
May not work for all snorers

customer_reviews.title: helpful tip
customer_reviews.text: Night two, wife still reports no snoring. fatigue is almost gone. Make them into a necklace that way if they fall out during the night you don't have to tear the bed apart looking for them
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and 100% effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke cause my wife has had it with my snoring.....She used to push or kick me to try and make me shift to stop snoring...This product actually works and now I am sleep abuse free lol
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: For every frustrated person who wants to smother their partner with a pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I certainly love the fact that I don’t have to hit, kick, poke or smother my husband throughout the night anymore. That alone should be an advertisement to buy these little gems. Thank you from a happy wife who is FINALLY getting 8 hours of sleep and not having to drink as much wine to do so. BUY THEM.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If your snoring is due to nasal valve collapse (like mine is,) then this is the solution. I do not know how anyone could say they are too hard, too soft, etc, the KIT COMES WITH ALL SIZES AND DIFFERENT MATERIALS. Come on people, baby bear's porridge. At least one in the kit will fit you. When it does, you will feel 1000 percent better. I know I did. It keeps the nostrils open during sleep, and even during they day while working out.
customer_reviews.author: White Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit skeptical but after trying it I am amazed. I slept really good for the first time in a long time. I use a mouthpiece to help keep me from snoring but the wife says I still snore at times and loud. This is my first week with these nose pieces and I am working night shift and sleeping alone so I can't verify if I am snoring or not but I slept great. Felt like a new man. I will update this review in a week once I get to spend a couple of nights with the wife to get her take on it.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has several different sizes so you get the correct fit and they're reusable as well. I had my doubts but they actually DO work!
customer_reviews.author: Lea DoubleYou

customer_reviews.title: It takes two nights of sleeping before the body adjusts to snoring with these in.
customer_reviews.text: After two days I wrote an ecstatic review about these. I boldly said they saved my relationship. Unicorns and rainbows appeared as I peacefully slept with these in my boyfriends nose. And then his body adjusted. His nose is now just as capable snoring with these in. Plus he said he’s getting a sore spot inside his nose. Maybe they work if the nose in question isn’t determined to do whatever it takes to continue snoring. Maybe they work for you, maybe not. Either way $17 isn’t that bad of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Searchfield

customer_reviews.title: wow it really helps
customer_reviews.text: you would never think that a tiny little device like that would help relief snoring, but it actually does! comes in several different sizes and 2 shapes so each person can find the most comfortable one it's small and doesn't stand out, so you can still sleep with in in grace, not like the big cpap machines or other solutions like chin straps and what not, that make you look like a little frankenstein and bother the sleep good and simple solution and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Michal Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this product for the past three days and am very happy with the results. I always feel like I cannot get enough air through my nose at night and this totally solved the problem! Reduced my snoring significantly too.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Where are the instructions?
customer_reviews.text: I do like the ability to breath better at night. My wife says it cut my snoring loudness down. The only issue I find with the product is there are no instructions. What are the two different types, which way to insert into nose, which size should I be using?
customer_reviews.author: AndyP99

customer_reviews.title: Like having straws up your nose while you sleep.
customer_reviews.text: How uncomfortable can you be and still sleep? That's the Dorts challenge! I put the small ones in my nose last night. I can tell you that you'll never forget they are in your nose. I even woke up a few times and the first sense that I was aware of was the feeling of these bad boys invading me in uncomfortable ways. My nose was also a broken facuet dripping mucus down my face. How cavernous are the nostrils of those that gave these things 5 stars? The large ones can't possibly be made for humans. Maybe grizzly bears or a large pig.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent to me while on vacation and sharing a room with my daughter. Apparently I snore and it keeps others awake. This product did not keep me from snoring so it was not a snoring solution for me. I should probably add that I was maybe drinking a lot of wine because I was on vacation and that may have contributed to the louder than usual snoring. Next vacation, the snoring solution will be for my daughter to drink more wine with me so she isn't disturbed. (She's over 21 so it's okay)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Austin

customer_reviews.title: Slight improvement...was hoping for miracle
customer_reviews.text: If you love your spouse but want to kill the hibernating bear they become at night, seek a professional. These help lessen the nose rattle but even a combo of allergy meds, nose strips and these won’t help major snoring beasts. Hubby complained hard ones aren’t comfortable but he uses the softer ones. If anything, buying multiple snoring devices is just a way to motivate them to do something about their snoring before you send them to sleep with the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: 8541family

customer_reviews.title: Product helps. Seller needs to chill out.
customer_reviews.text: The product helps out. It’s fine. The seller is garbage. 6 emails in 2 days for reviews. This is insane.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Markham

customer_reviews.title: Only worked the first night
customer_reviews.text: My poor hubby is trying everything on the market to get his snoring to stop so I can get a good nights rest. This one, failed the test. The first night it worked beautifully, I only had to adjust him once during the night to stop snoring. Yet the 2nd night and even 3rd back to snoring except now his nose was bleeding! I saw dried blood on them when I was cleaning his nightstand and immediately threw them away!!! Back to the search we go...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Dortz Excellent stays in/no irritation or discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. See my review of other similar products. This one does not fall out when I move from one side to my other side while sleeping. There is not irritation as with other products. I would recommend buy this product. It's too bad that I purchased other similar products that failed to stay put or irritates the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Andyski

customer_reviews.title: did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I think because I snore very heavy and loud, this product does not work for me. It's a great concept and feels alot better than some other products I have tried. It is very comfortable and you do not even notice that you are wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanika Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these would actually work, but my husband has been complaining about my snoring, so I figured I'd try it. Well, I am pleasantly surprised that they work so well! I was a CPAP user and found that the machine was annoying and not helping (mask leaked, machine made too much noise, hoses woke me when I moved). These are so simple and I have been sleeping so much better!
customer_reviews.author: teacher314

customer_reviews.title: Let me sleep!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip where I was going to be sleeping in a room with a few people and was worried that I'd keep them up or worse... that they'd wake me up lol. All of my bunk mates are happy to report the these worked!!! The solid ones are much softer and more comfortable. The ringed ones are too hard and I didn't want to wear them. So glad they worked!
customer_reviews.author: Catnap

customer_reviews.title: The painting is amazing. The side pieces (sword and weapon) are really ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 - Semper FI About the product. It's all metal. ALL. The painting is amazing. The side pieces (sword and weapon) are really much more clear than they are seeming. This went on the back of my new car and I will not be taking it off ever... maybe when I get rid of that car and get a new one, but I think it will stay for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I could see how these could help someone but they didn't work well for me. I've tried every imaginable way to get these things to stay in/be comfortable and I wake up with them somewhere in my room. While they are in they apparently work great, but at some point, my subconscious yanks them out and has me throw them across the room in a rage I guess. I dunno. It was worth a shot but I would not recommend them. Maybe it needs to be more customizable because none of them fit perfectly. Either just a little small or just a little big.
customer_reviews.author: PondermaN

customer_reviews.title: Ok but didn't stop snoring completely
customer_reviews.text: It helped but didnt eliminate snoring. Pushed me to go get tested for sleep apnea. Turns out I have severe sleep apnea. Have a CPAP now and been using it 2 weeks and is life changing. If you think you might have apnea get a sleep study will greatly improved your health.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The snoring issue is not a simple one, a doctor has told me it is caused by a variety of reasons. The product description leads the buyer to think this product can solve them all. This device did not work for me at all. I beleive they are designed to keep the nostrals open. If you are reasonably sure your nostrals close when sleeping, this product might worl for you. I will say, packaged well, easy to insert and confortable to wear, almost un-noticeable
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky
customer_reviews.text: Nutshell: They are quite soft and comfortable and install easily. Just enough structure to hold my nostrils open but not create pain. It does not take a rocket surgeon to insert them. I tried the various sizes and I tried pushing them in further and easing them out incrementally over about an hour of trial. I fall asleep instantly and was immediately rewarded by waking myself snoring through them each time. I use a CPAP normally and was interested to find out if these were that "thing" I had missed that were going to relieve me of strapping on the "Iron Lung" every night. Moreover I would have loved these to simplify camping trips...**sighhh**
customer_reviews.author: Serena Hyde

customer_reviews.title: MY girl was like WTF is that
customer_reviews.text: I was allergic to the material. I don't think this item is intended to prevent you from snoring. It was irritating and kept falling out of my nose. MY girl was like WTF is that? Seek other options for snoring solutions. Don't embarrass yourself by having this in your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Feels great. Just Doesn't Fit..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking and sturdy license plate frame. Unfortunately, it doesn't fit my 2019 F150. One of the most popular Trucks on the planet. It's just the Marine Corps emblem on the bottom of the frame that causes the problem with the bumper. I still gave it a 5 star review because it's such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeDirective

customer_reviews.title: They actually Work.
customer_reviews.text: They actually work. They are easy to use, and do not hurt the inside of your nose. Might not solve all your "noise at night" problems, but does allow you to breath all night without sprays or bulky equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Dog

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but a tad too short
customer_reviews.text: I think these, compared to a lot of others I tried, are very comfortable to wear. Nice and soft. It's also really beneficial that they are not white, making it easier to find in the bed if they fall out at night. The only complaint I'd have is that they are on the shorter side.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Because of DORTZ my girl touches me intimately again! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY IVE BEEN WAITING FOR SOMETHING! I snore. Im healthy in shape but I snore. My girl hated me and wanted me dead but now because of this she touches me and gave me a bubble bath with candles. I love this product. They are one time use so buy a few.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have sleep apnea and these didn't help at all. The main problem is they fall out during the night no matter which size I use. Would be helpful if directions we're included
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting to be so pleased with this. I have bought other brands before and it felt like I was trying to breath through....oh I don’t know what. The obstruction was much worse I am very happy with these! In fact I am ordering another box right now. Seriously! I highly recommend them I don’t know what else to say.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my snoring. I felt like I could breath better through my nose but my wife said I snored all night.
customer_reviews.author: Dave U.

customer_reviews.title: I guess it’s a personal thing
customer_reviews.text: I snore pretty bad and was trying to find something to help it and cane acorss these, the product had some good reviews so I thought that I would try it out even though my bf was doubtful. Personally, these did not work for me. I played with different sizes and found a size that fit ok but idk if my nose is just tiny but it made the inside of my nose bleed because I had to keep pushing them back in to stay inside my nose. All in all to me it’s not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but these actually reduced my snoring
customer_reviews.text: Having tried many kinds of devices to reduce snoring, I was skeptical of these, but they actually help quite a bit. They reduced but did not completely eliminate snoring in my case (everyone has different issues), but still an improvement. When you use the right size they don't fall out of your nose when I toss and turn, and keeping my nasal passage open is definitely reducing my snoring according to my husband, and I sleep better not constantly waking myself up with the snoring sensation. Just wish I could just order some more of the same size, instead of the whole kit - seems wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoTex

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable enough that I take them out.
customer_reviews.text: This may or may not work, but I don't know because I always end up taking them out while I am sleeping. This isn't exactly their fault, but searching for something that I don't feel as much. My search for anti snoring devices continues! That being said, the price is right for you to try it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Uncomfortable to Wear
customer_reviews.text: Saw this promoted on The Today Show so wanted to try to help with some light snoring. Set comes in 2 styles with 4 different sizes for each. Two issues with the devices: Comfort level and size. Two individuals in our household tried and both found the devices to be too uncomfortable to sleep. Back sleeping with no movement might work but I doubt that's feasible. Also, the sizes did not work; one was too small and the next was too large. Both styles were equally uncomfortable. Tried on two different nights and failed both nights.
customer_reviews.author: Surfn2Shop

customer_reviews.title: easier to breathe
customer_reviews.text: While we don't know if this solved sleep apnea, it certainly made it easier to breathe. IF you have a cold these are the way to go! will report back about the sleep apnea.
customer_reviews.author: ellenpoe

customer_reviews.title: I don't snore
customer_reviews.text: No matter what my husband says. I don't snore. I bought these for when I'm sick. I get so congested that I end up with a sinus infection, bronchitis and a migraine. I put these in and they opened my nose back up just enough to be able to breath. For added relief, I put the tiniest dab of Vicks Vapo Rub in each side. Talk about instant relief straight to the brain. I'm super glad they come in different sizes because I've been keeping them in my purse and passing them out to everyone I see getting sick!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: My Bed-friend thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft, pliable and very comfortable. The first time I used them it was for only a few hours before bed, then took them out. Went to sleep and i didn't snore or mouth breath. Next night used them while sleeping and it worked again. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: KBI

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I’m awake right now at 12:30 AM because my man is snoring so loud. Yes, he’s wearing this product as he is sawing logs right now! He has tried all the sizes and nothing works. I’m getting no sleep and have to work in the morning. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Tried them (all of them) hated them...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my girlfriend who normally breathes through her mouth when she sleeps and she loved the idea of them. Well she tried them and hated them. She has now tried every size that came in the kit and none were comfortable, none felt right and none managed to stay in her nose through the night. The kit ended up being a waste of money. All we really got was another box on the nightstand and a snore nose out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, and nowhere near as effective as nose strips
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to work so I could stop wasting money on nose strips, but I tried all different sizes for like three nights in a row, just swapping between them and I'd wake up in the morning with the plugs being on the bed and not in my nose, and even falling asleep with it in was rough because it irritated my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not made to fit my Marine son’s Ford Ranger.
customer_reviews.text: High-quality frame for my Marine son’s truck, but there are a couple issues, at least for the Ford Ranger we installed it on: I had to cut back the scabbard on the sword for it to fit, and the bumper is also in the way of the bottom of the frame, so you can’t see the word, “Marines.” Wouldn’t have bought it ifI knew that ahead of time, but I didn’t return it because we wanted a frame on the truck when my son arrived home on leave to pick it up to drive to his base.
customer_reviews.author: marcusmembrane

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these helped open up my narrow nasal passages. I have less headaches in the morning and I am breathing much easier. What I didn't like was the discomfort. Other reviewers stated that they couldn't feel them when inserted, well they must be completely numb in their nose. The manufacturer uses the same cheap plastic that 20 oz sodas use for a cap. There is a much softer and firm rubber that could be used and be less irritating to your nasal passages. Almost twenty dollars for cheap plastic that weighs about an ounce is an outrageous price. I will look around for other manufacturers who are not so greedy.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality, best I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing my long-lived chrome-plated yellow and red letter USMC frame. This one is much better quality, and so sturdy. that one was by comparison thin metal. Easily the strongest frame I have ever seen. I was afraid the letters and emblem might be plastic before I bought it, they are not. The letters are part of the pressed metal frame and the inset emblem is beautiful and sealed in rubber. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth trying! Might change your life.
customer_reviews.text: These were a God-send for our family. They were the first thing that REALLY worked to quiet my husband’s snoring. I recommended them to several people who also had great success using them. They worked perfectly...until they didn’t. For some reason they stopped being very effective for my husband—but it might just be him (other health issues). I would definitely give these a try, they have been life-changing for lots of people we know. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Correct size important for good sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Wife is using them. Having a number of sizes to choose from was important. The soft nose cones were too soft but the others Work okay. The medium size worked although a little longer than needed. She was able to get eight hours sleep for the first Time in months with the second choice of the cone. A real relief!
customer_reviews.author: Earl Yates

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for the bleeding and pain!
customer_reviews.text: I do have a deviated septum. A doctor told me once that surgery wasn't needed. I assume this is why I often have trouble breathing through my nose at night. This product helped but it was painful and caused nose bleeds. So... I stopped using it. I don't know if the pain/bleeding is because of my deviated septum or if it would/could happen to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nicest USMC plate surround available.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame to put on my 69 Camaro. This is without a doubt the nicest quality plate surround that's available. All the others seem to be cheap plastic. This one is made nice and sturdy. Of course there had to be one problem though... My 69 only has lower plate screws so I'm going to have to do a little modification to the plate bracket to make this fit. Semper fi! Sgt H.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: I'm Surprised; They Actually Work!
customer_reviews.text: They actually work! I don't fully understand how they work, but they do. The snoring is significantly less and everyone is able to sleep better. They include several pairs in different sizes. I'm able to wear a few of them comfortably which is nice in case I misplace one. I'd tried a different anti-snoring device before trying these and I found it to be bulky and uncomfortable. I didn't make it through the night with it. These are soft and flexible and easy to adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer- Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical when I found this product even after reading the reviews. Let me tell you these are a game changer. My husband and I can finally sleep in the same bed again. He used to wake me up so much snoring so loud and I would be exhausted the next day. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: crlygrl80

customer_reviews.title: As the spouse of the snorer, these don't work but they were worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I do believe that these work for some people but waking up at 1 AM every night while my husband wears them is a no for me. These came in all different sizes and look somewhat comfortable to wear. My totally-cool husband looks even more totally-cool wearing them... okay not really, they're kind of goofy looking but you're sleeping so it's okay. The container is nice and small to keep them in the nightstand. I wouldn't recommend these to those with chronic snoring problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Suspenseful surprise!
customer_reviews.text: So When I received this I was beyond impressed with the quality of this plate! Sent my hubby to put gas in my car while he left his with me and he didn't notice the plate for literally a full day! The suspense was killing me and I had to tell him hey look at your plate lol! He almost cried with joy!
customer_reviews.author: Neelie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits your car
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the frame, very solid with very cool USMC design. However it did not fit my VW rear plate location ( where I wanted to place the frame). Un fortunately I sent it bacak and went with a Marine Corps emblem stick on ( I haven't put it on yet as the weather has been too cold/cool).
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Works for some but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not real comfortable, but definitely not unbearable. (I dabbed a very small amount of organic coconut oil on the ends before inserting). There are different sizes so you can be sure there are some that fit. And yes, they are easy to clean just using mild soap and warm water and allowing to air dry. But...with that said, they did not work for me. After approximately 10 seconds in my nose, they made me sneeze and....out they flew. Every time I inserted them this happened. So I was never able to use them when I slept. So I honestly can’t say if they would work well or not.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Arnold

customer_reviews.title: It might be worth a gamble, didn't work at all for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a month. My wife said it did nothing to silence my snoring. I was very hopeful it would work. For me it was money down the drain. The one benefit is that when I used the product it helped me keep my mouth shut so I didn't wake up with a dry mouth. It is slightly uncomfortable, but after a few hours you don't notice it that much. I think if nasal strips reduce your snoring this product might work great for you, and would be worth gambling your money to see if works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Plate Frames, Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome frame. Details (paint and 3D imagery) are done very well. It does come with a Marine Corps verification/authorization, so it better last. I have had 2 other Marine Corps metal plate frames that have done well but once winter and the salty roads hit those plates would eventually get surface rust. Sure you can clean them but cleaning is only partial and the rust comes back in a heartbeat. I am hoping this one can last many winters without those issues. I would definitely recommend this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Echo4Bravo-USMC

customer_reviews.title: Better then breathing strips!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t buy this for snoring, bought it to overcome deviated septum that makes it difficult to breath when congested. Works like a charm. Way better that those nasal strips that don’t stick all night. Comfortable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot11

customer_reviews.title: Solid class.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that reflected my esprit de corps but, I wanted something classy that didn't leave sticky glue all over when it fell off - this license plate frame is perfect. It came fairly quick, is solid and classy, easy to install, and has held up fairly well over the past year. My only issue is some of the painted black enamel in the MARINES lettering on the bottom row has chipped out. I live in the land of snow, ice, and salt and wash my car frequently in the winter, so it's to be expected in time. Beyond that, I'm very pleased with this plate holder. Semper Fi, Marines.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Nord

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, and to top it off they are very uncomfortable and irritate your nostrils to the point that they feel like they are shaffing your nostrils. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Only way you know is to try them
customer_reviews.text: Did not work well for me. You buy a set to know they work and you keep them, or, they don't work and you throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT KISTNER

customer_reviews.title: Reduced, but not 100% eliminated
customer_reviews.text: The product is made with high quality materials, and fairly comfortable, but didn't completely stop my snoring. My snoring is "softer" as my wife put it, but still present. I had to use the largest size in the box to get a snug fit and prevent from falling out. My breathing is better balanced now and helps reduce dry mouth / chapped lips in the AM.
customer_reviews.author: Don A.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting idea...hard to keep in
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea and it does give someone sleeping in the same room time to go to sleep without being kept awake by snoring, but most nights, they either fall out or they somehow end up on the nightstand the next morning....I guess I take the device out in the night when they bother me without me realizing it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: These things saved my relationship. Pure magic!
customer_reviews.text: These crazy little things honestly saved my relationship and probably my boyfriends life. I was wearing ear plugs, sleeping with a sound machine, putting a pillow over my head, taking sleeping pills, and making him wear a nose strip. NOTHING WORKED. His snoring was so bad it was making me insane - like filled with sleep deprived rage. We decided to give these a try and BOOM. Magic. Thank the universe and whatever wizard invented these because his snorting is like 90% improved and he’s even said he’s sleeping better too because he feels like he can breathe finally.
customer_reviews.author: KGood

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and it works. I just stuffed the largest one up my nose and wow, breathing got a lot easier. They stayed in all night because I no longer tossed and turned. I just plain slept better. I'm going to wear these during the day to see if they permanently modify my nose, then I can toss them. I like the fact you can clean them in the shower, although they weren't visibly dirty.
customer_reviews.author: lewweingarth

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a USMC license plate frame and was lucky to find this one. Well constructed, so far holding up well, and it looks elegant and distinctive. If you are Old Breed or New Breed you can mount this with pride on your ride. ooorah
customer_reviews.author: Rocannon MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit a 2019 Ram Laramie
customer_reviews.text: For such a beautiful product, it was poorly packaged and came bent and a little twisted. I was able to almost get it back to it's original shape by carefully twisting it in the opposite direction. It was a very tight fit on my 2019 Ram 1500 Laramie but I was able to get it mounted. Unfortunately, upon opening and closing the tailgate, the license plate frame caught on the tailgate badly enough to make a loud snapping sound and take paint off the tailgate. I'll be returning it for another one that fits.
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: I hope they hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Insert with the fin-like pieces facing up so they prop in your nose correctly. Really opens up your nasal cavities and prevents mouth breathing. I hope they hold up, but they’re such a good value I’ just buy more if they don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Odd but comfy and they work
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely an odd first try. My snoring is getting worse according to my wife. I honestly forgot I was wearing these after the first minute or two. They come with many sizes so that part is easy. They fit snug in your nostrils and most definitely keep your airways thru your nose much much easier to breath thru. I didn't know I'd need it but the difference in breathing is noticeable right away. For snoring reduction, they seemed to reduce my snoring and volume from what I hear. After a few nights Id say I definitely slept better and will be using often.
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Live alone and supply your friends!
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep nasal passages open so you use nose rather than mouth breathing at night! I sleep on back and partially tape my mouth to encourage nose breathing and hopefully prevent snoring. I would like to be able to get only the size I need rather than 4 different sizes!!.When I lose or accidentally throw away my two, I have to buy whole new pack. I end up giving the others away to friends. Last pack I got did not seem to be as comfortable or of the best quality? Knock-off?different supplier?!
customer_reviews.author: pat oakley

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product only 3 times so far, and I can tell the difference in my energy levels. I usually have a difficult time staying up during the day. I find myself falling asleep suddenly, and I always attributed it to my lack of sleep because of my snoring. I would love to record myself and see how much of a difference it makes. The only issue i do have with it is that it is very long so it doesn't fit like the model in pictures (only reason I don't give it 5 stars). I find it falls out, but so far it seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sylicon nose vents
customer_reviews.text: This anti snoring vents are awesome! They work like a magic! Material is very soft sylicon so you barely feel them in your nose. At last my hubby can breath fully at night time. They come in different sizes so you can find right size for all family members that need them. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sadi

customer_reviews.title: Stops Dry Mouth
customer_reviews.text: By holding open nostrils, this means that I don't sleep with my mouth open. Without it, my mouth gets very dry which is harmful to teeth. It's very easy to wear. Stays in all night. I use the smaller sizes and trim so that it's a shorter (so that it doesn't go very far up into my nose). Another great advantage -- if I have a stuffy nose, it keeps my nostrils clear so that i can breathe through my nose.
customer_reviews.author: green valley

customer_reviews.title: These odd little things work
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 sinus surgeries and still have congestion and snoring. I've tried the bands that go across the nose and those were "ok" but didn't work as well as I wanted. I kept thinking there had to be something better. Then I found Dortz! One one hand its an odd idea to put something up my nose to avoid congestion, but then again it made sense that they could keep my nasal passages open. So...I took a chance and ordered them. I love them! It took about 2 nights for me to adjust to them, and now that I have I won't sleep without them not even for a short nap.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn E.

customer_reviews.title: These things work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Once you figure out which size is best for you they fit comfortably. I noticed immediately I could breathe through my nose with ease. I’m getting better sleep now and so is my wife cause I’m not waking us both up several times through the night. I do occasionally wake up and have to look for them but for the most part they stay in all night. I wish they offered them in specific sizes though. Having sizes I’ll never use is kind of a waste. No regrets! Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wert

customer_reviews.title: Pride as Marine
customer_reviews.text: As a retired Marine, I really like this frame - it's well designed with USMC icons - it catches the eye. The only problem I have is with the vehicle I put it on. My truck has a back step bumper that is higher than usual (I guess) and it covers the lower portion of the license plate frame.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Rodgers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My husband's snoring issue was only temporarily controlled but then he adapted to the device and the snoring began again.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: give you plenty size but only 1 pair works if you lost that pair... the rest are in to trash bin.
customer_reviews.text: for me, it waste of money. It falls of my nose and I lost it all the time, under pillow away far from my bed somewhere I have to find it every time I want to use it. End up not more than a week I couldn't find it anymore.... A box has multiple sizes but only 1 work for you. If you lose it, you won't have another pair. The rest of them goes in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: various sizes
customer_reviews.text: Well these help somewhat, but because I'm also a nasal snorer (of epic proportions as I've be so told), they only helped me a little. For someone who is a throat snorer, I would think these would work well with the addition of a chin strap device. For the price, I was happy with the result, even if it didn't completely fix it.
customer_reviews.author: g. b.

customer_reviews.title: A sample set.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I found the size and material that works best for my nose. What's that? You don't sell packs of the same size? And I have the rest of the pack I can't use. Thus, low reviews. I will covet the one that works until it starts giving me nasal infections.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Work pretty good but they stay moist...
customer_reviews.text: They work ok. I don’t like the fact they make the inside of my nostrils sweaty or they stay moist with a small amount of nose moisture. Anyway, I tried them, I like them about 3 stars and that’s it. Easy to clean, and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: David M Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: These don’t work
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work. Had high hopes of getting a good nights rest next to Chewbacca over there. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: M size
customer_reviews.text: it is a great product. it works. for my husband the size should be M, but it brings 2 of each, 2 small, 2 medium and 2 large. I would like to get a package with only M size. it lasted 4 weeks before falling off due to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V.

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough
customer_reviews.text: These do work. Like my hubby and me used these on our greyhound bus travel for a 9 hour journey in which I was awake and my hubby was sleeping for a few hours. Usually his snoring is really loud but with this in his nostrils I’d say only 10% of his snoring volume could be heard. Hope that makes sense & helps.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Thachamuchical

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: As long as I can remember my nose (which has been broken a number times) has 'stuffed' up as soon as I lay down. I've used these 'anti snoring devices' for the past 4 nights and for the past 4 nights I've been able to breathe at night. What a relief. It sure beats sleeping while sitting up in a chair in order to breathe!
customer_reviews.author: DD430

customer_reviews.title: Love it! USMC
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on the back over my Southwest Asia Service Medal license plate since the plate doesn't say USMC. Giving it 5 stars because of the quality of the frame and that it's a Marine frame....Semper Fi Devil Dogs.
customer_reviews.author: boxcar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work. They don’t stay in nose, fall out after I fall asleep and don’t do a thing to prevent snoring. These are just a gimmick [UPDATE - Seller honored satisfaction guarantee and provided full refund - product didn't work out but great seller service! - increasing rating to 3 stars, average of 5 for the seller and 1 for the product.]
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: The do not work
customer_reviews.text: The idea sounds great, but these did NOTHING to resolve my husbands’ snoring. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Y.N-G

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and made my eyes water. Unusable for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a snoring problem for years, and have tried numerous remedies to no avail, that is until I came across the "Snore Care Set" - nasal dilators. They were easy to use and hardly knew they were there. I slept well and best of all, didn't force my wife to retreat to our guest room. My wife says "thank you", with a smile.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Seaquist

customer_reviews.title: No more snoring
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gag gift for my husband and to my surprise he actually tried it out. I thought they seemed kinda big and uncomfortable but he said they weren’t uncomfortable at all. Comes with different sizes and styles. It’s helped with the snoring which is amazing, this is the best week of sleep I’ve had in awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: My wife said not only did they not work but it added a whistle sound to my snoring making it even worse. Oh well I’ll have to find something else
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Duarte

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to show your pride to the corps
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to show your pride to the corps.. This frame is heavy duty and by far the best made Mari e corps frame on the market. What I didn’t appreciate was the EGA decal on the lower portion of my frame is not centered and would definitely not stand up to a marine corps inspection. All in all still a very nice frame.
customer_reviews.author: TechReviews78

customer_reviews.title: Hubby can sleep again!
customer_reviews.text: So I basically snore loud enough to rattle walls and since using these, my husband says it's like night and day. :) I love the fact that these come in so many sizes, too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it works. I do not have to kick and push my husband anymore and finally I can get good sleep. It is great that kit comes with different sizes, this way you can chose the one that fits you.
customer_reviews.author: Morri

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about this product! Don't give up on it, try a different size. The one that feels best to me is the one that has holes in it. I notice it less before falling asleep. The most excellent feeling is when I wake up and feel awesome! No headaches and I am not still tired. I also use a nose spray at night and the combination is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: These are not only good for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: These are not only good for sleeping and opening your airway, help with snoring, but when you feel you cannot breath due to cold, anxiety, etc. they work well to help get fresh air in.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Breathe easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very comfortable. Has reduced my snoring big time. Easy to use. Comes in different size. How I use this product is to basically breathe through the nose. This is really works.
customer_reviews.author: The Sham

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores so. Freaking. Loud. Like a chainsaw in your ear loud. These help soooooooooo much! The only bad thing is they fall out pretty easily. I have to wrestle him awake multiple times a night to find them so he can put them back in. BUT when they’re in.... they work. They’re amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea.
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay in my nose. I pull them every night, I wear them. I've try the smallest to the largest. This Product does not work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Truth

product_meta.title: Set of 8 Nasal Dilators - Anti Snoring Devices - Snoring Solution - Snore Stopper Set - Natural Stop Snoring Devices Reduce Snoring - Anti Snoring Nose Vents
feature_bullets: EASY BREATHING & COMFORT: The best otolaryngologists have developed this snore stopper kit, which allows you and your loved ones to eliminate snoring, giving everyone soft nasal breathing during sleep.

DESIGN & QUALITY: The modern design replicates the anatomy of your nose to provide you with the safest and most enjoyable sleep. Our anti-snoring devices are made from high-quality materials such as medical silicone, BPA free plastic.
SET of 8 pairs + TRAVEL CASE: Each package includes 8 pairs of anti-snoring nasal vents. Two different types in 4 sizes. Snoring solution includes a convenient storage case.

Dortz tries to satisfy the wishes of each customer. We highly appreciate your gratitude and trust. We are sure that our anti-snoring device will solve your problem and you will become our next satisfied customer.
Durability and Reusability: Thanks to quality materials and a storage case, you can use nose vents for a long time. The nasal dilators are comfortable and easy to use and clean.
